projects.title: Going from idea to full AI in your company is as simple as 1-2-3!
projects.description: redistill.net acquires, cleans, manages, secures & trains AI data

projects.title: No hidden surprises or charges! You are in control of your AI budget.
projects.description: Everything including people, servers, GPU, management overhead ...everything is priced in. You get a single monthly invoice in your local currency and in your local country. You are in control of your budget and still achieve world-class AI
